documentation.text: @dev Withdraw ETH contributed only if contributed and withdraw flag is set to 'true'
@dev Owner only function to set the withdraw flag to 'true'
@dev End genesis period and transfer contract balance to owner wallet
@dev Ower only funciton to pause contract
@dev Owner only function to unpause contract

attributes.text: @dev Withdraw ETH contributed only if contributed and withdraw flag is set to 'true'
@dev Owner only function to set the withdraw flag to 'true'
@dev End genesis period and transfer contract balance to owner wallet
@dev Ower only funciton to pause contract
@dev Owner only function to unpause contract

allowWithdraw().details: Owner only function to set the withdraw flag to 'true'

endGenesis().details: End genesis period and transfer contract balance to owner wallet

params._owner: Address of wallet that will have administrative priviledges over the contract
params._threshold: Max amount of ETH to collect before automatically stopping collection

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pauseGenesis().details: Ower only funciton to pause contract

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpauseGenesis().details: Owner only function to unpause contract

withdraw().details: Withdraw ETH contributed only if contributed and withdraw flag is set to 'true'
